page.title: 10 My Family's Weekend
page.content: On Saturday I went to my nan's for breakfast. Where my second cousin and great Aunt were staying for a fortnight. After breakfast I went to get my sister Hayley because my other sister Natalie and my mum were going to the dentist's so my nan was going to look after us. Nanny hired a beach hut so we collected everything we needed, put it in the car and took it to the beach hut. Then we came back and went to the shops to buy a small dinghy. When we got home, mum was back from the dentist's so she came over to my nan's where we all had lunch together. While we were having lunch Concorde flew over so everyone rushed for their cameras.
